ComicInfo.Summary:
A company of Moloch's soldiers go on a seek and destroy mission while their captive Mike informs Moloch of King Zombie's intelligence and malevolence.
A 200 year old vampire trapped inside the body a of a 12 year old boy makes a pact with the mysterious shopkeeper of Gideon's; a place where souls can be cleansed, evil manipulated and desires are a valuable commodity.
